short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to top quality live interpretation. This extension allows you to attend a meeting or event in your own language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Please note: This listening app is designed specifically for meeting and event participants who need to listen to simultaneous interpretation. Interpreters using the cAPPisco RSI platform should install the extension "cAPPisco for Interpreters".

With this browser extension, you can easily listen to live simultaneous interpretation provided by professional conference interpreters, allowing you to follow meetings or events in the language of your choice.

Simply pin this app to your browser bar for quick access. During any multilingual meeting where interpreters are using cAPPisco to provide simultaneous interpretation, you can open the app with a single click.

To access the interpretation, use the secure Session ID and password provided by cAPPisco or the meeting organizer before the event. Once logged in, you can select your preferred language channel and enjoy human, real-time interpretation from professional interpreters.
